subtitles.text: Yasumoto & Kobayashi: Next Week is Already the Birthday Festival!

Yasumoto&Kobayashi Next Week is Already the Birthday Festival! As the spring tour is about to turn around, next week on June 13th (Mon.), we will hold a solo live for the birthday of Utao Kobayashi "Poland !!!!!!!", and on June 14th (Tue.), we will hold a solo live for the birthday of Ayaka Yasumoto "Singing and Singing". On June 13 (Mon.) and 14 (Tue.), Ayaka Yasumoto's birthday solo live "Singing, Dancing and Singing Show !!! Yasumoto's solo live will be held at KT Zepp Yokohama on Tuesday, March 14. We asked the two main performers about the highlights of this year's live! Ayaka Yasumoto's solo live will also be held in Osaka on Monday, June 27.
Po-Land 7!!!!!!!
